thoughts.text: It seems that the 'clone_repository' command failed again. Let's try cloning a different repository to see if we can successfully clone a repository.
thoughts.reasoning: Cloning a different repository will allow us to see if the previous error was due to a syntax error or a permissions issue.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'clone_repository' command with the arguments 'url': 'https://github.com/udacity/ud036_StarterCode.git' and 'clone_path': '/home/atlas/udacity' to clone a repository.
thoughts.criticism: One potential issue with this plan is that we may still not have permission to access the repository, but we can start by cloning a simple repository that contains a README file.
thoughts.speak: Let's try cloning a different repository to see if we can successfully clone a repository.
